title: Flamingals Low Rise Straight Leg Wide Leg Baggy Jeans Women Stretch Boyfriend Butterfly Flare Denim Pants
description: Features: low rise, cargo, wide leg, high stretch, boot cut, baggy, y2k. Butterfly Flare leg design adds a stylish touch, while the button and zipper closure provide convenience. The low waist provides a flattering fit, and the pocket, zipper, and button details add practicality. Elevate your appearance and show off your personality with these versatile jeans

Material: Made from carefully chosen super stretch fabric to ensure our customers feel comfortable in all positions, whether sitting or squatting. The soft, lightweight, and breathable fabric reduces any sense of restriction

Occasion: This garment is remarkably versatile and can be worn on a variety of occasions. Whether you're running errands, attending a casual get-together, or heading to the office, this piece is the perfect choice. It's even suitable for more formal events like parties or dinners out. Additionally, it's an excellent option for students, working professionals, and anyone who wants to look stylish and feel comfortable
Our jeans feature back pockets and a low rise for a trendy and flattering look. For a relaxed fit, explore our baggy wide leg jeans and low waisted baggy jeans

Friendly reminder, If you prefer a looser fit, please order a larger size. Before placing your order, please refer to the size measurements in the last item picture. Our sizing is based on a true-to-size fit, and as outfit fit experts, we recommend following the size chart. The fabric is super stretchy, so it's important to select the exact size that fits you
